page.title: 08Camp Sites - Paignton
page.content: The International Camp site lies on the main Totnes to Paignton Road, and covers some 14 acres. Every year, opening at Easter, closing at the end of September, 15000 people use the site. The present site has been owned by our school Governor for ten years. It is open for families only, now a general trend amongst most camp sites. The site can take about seventy caravans, fifty caravanettes and two hundred tents. There is a club house and a childrens room. There are nightly disco's for adults and a separate disco for children. There is a swimming pool 0.7m deep at the shallow end and 2.2m deep at the deep end.It is the only touring park with the five pennant award in the U.K.
